overview: June 12th, 2009 :: Chikara partners with Big Japan Wrestling! Kaz “Green Ant” Miyakami faces Tigre Rojo while Chuck Taylor takes on the slippery Michael Nakazawa! Atsushi Ohashi and Mototsugu Shimizu wrestle 2.0! In the main event, The Colony battles The Order Of The Neo Solar Temple!
title: Chikara Japan Showcase in Saitama
